## Ratelimiter.verify() method

Verify if the request is going beyond the ratelimit.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
verify(region: Region, method: string): {
        pass: boolean;
        wait: number;
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  region | [Region](./shieldbow.region.md) | The region the request is for. |
|  method | string | The method the request is for. |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ pass: boolean; wait: number; }
